trans-unit.target: 每当任一牌手使用以警车放逐的牌时，你抓一张牌并转换警车。

trans-unit.resname: BRC·1 | Mishra, Eminent One | Card Name
BRC·1 | Mishra, Eminent One | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a token that's a copy of target noncreature artifact you control, except its name is Mishra's Warform and it's a 4/4 Construct artifact creature in addition to its other types. It gains haste until end of turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: 在你回合的战斗开始时，派出一个衍生物，其为目标由你操控之非生物神器的复制品，但名称是米斯拉的战形械，为4/4组构体神器生物，且仍具有原本类别。它获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。在下一个结束步骤开始时，将它牺牲。

trans-unit.resname: BRC·2 | Urza, Chief Artificer | Card Name
BRC·2 | Urza, Chief Artificer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Affinity for artifact creatures (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact creature you control.)
trans-unit.target: 神器生物共鸣（你每操控一个神器生物，此咒语便减少{1}来施放。）

trans-unit.resname: BRC·2 | Urza, Chief Artificer | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Artifact creatures you control have menace.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的神器生物具有威慑异能。

trans-unit.resname: BRC·2 | Urza, Chief Artificer | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, create a 0/0 colorless Construct artifact creature token with "This creature gets +1/+1 for each artifact you control."
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，派出一个0/0无色组构体衍生神器生物，且具有「你每操控一个神器，此生物便得+1/+1。」

trans-unit.resname: BRC·3 | Tawnos, Solemn Survivor | Card Name
BRC·3 | Tawnos, Solemn Survivor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}, {T}: Create a token that's a copy of up to one target artifact token you control. Mill two cards.
trans-unit.target: {2}，{T}：派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为至多一个目标由你操控之衍生神器的复制品。磨两张牌。

trans-unit.resname: BRC·3 | Tawnos, Solemn Survivor | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {1}{W}{U}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice two artifact tokens, Exile an artifact or creature card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of the exiled card, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: {1}{W}{U}{B}，{T}，牺牲两个衍生神器，从你的坟墓场放逐一张神器或生物牌：派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为所放逐之牌的复制品，但它额外具有神器此类别。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.resname: BRC·4 | Ashnod the Uncaring | Card Name
BRC·4 | Ashnod the Uncaring | Card Text | Paragraph 1
BRC·4 | Ashnod the Uncaring | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you activate an ability of an artifact or creature that isn't a mana ability, if one or more permanents were sacrificed to activate it, you may copy that ability. You may choose new targets for the copy. (Sacrificing an artifact for mana to activate an ability doesn't count.)
trans-unit.target: 每当你起动神器或生物的异能，且其不为法术力异能时，若牺牲了一个或数个永久物来起动，则你可以复制该异能。你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。（因产生起动异能所需之法术力而牺牲的神器不属此类。）

trans-unit.resname: BRC·21 | Disciple of Caelus Nin | Card Name
BRC·21 | Disciple of Caelus Nin | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, starting with you, each player chooses up to five permanents they control. All permanents other than CARDNAME that weren't chosen this way phase out.
trans-unit.target: 当凯路忍信徒进战场时，由你开始，每位牌手各选择至多五个由其操控的永久物。所有未以此法选中的永久物跃离，但凯路忍信徒除外。

trans-unit.resname: BRC·21 | Disciple of Caelus Nin | Card Text | Paragraph 2
BRC·22 | The Brothers' War | Card Name
BRC·22 | The Brothers' War | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
trans-unit.target: （于此传纪进战场时及于你抓牌步骤后，加一个学问指示物。到III后牺牲之。）

trans-unit.resname: BRC·22 | The Brothers' War | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: I — Create two tapped Powerstone tokens.
trans-unit.target: I — 派出两个已横置的魔力石衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: BRC·22 | The Brothers' War | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: II — Choose two target players. Until your next turn, each creature they control attacks the other chosen player each combat if able.
trans-unit.target: II — 选择两位目标牌手。对每个由这些牌手操控的生物而言，直到你的下一个回合，该生物每次战斗若能攻击另一位所选牌手，则必须如此攻击。

trans-unit.resname: BRC·22 | The Brothers' War | Card Text | Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: III — CARDNAME deals X damage to any target and X damage to any other target, where X is the number of artifacts you control.
trans-unit.target: III — 兄弟之战对任意一个目标造成X点伤害，且对任意另一个目标造成X点伤害，X为由你操控的神器数量。

BRC·23 | Sardian Avenger | Card Text | Paragraph 1
BRC·23 | Sardian Avenger | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.target: 每当沙地亚复仇者攻击时，它得+X/+0直到回合结束，X为由所有对手操控的神器数量。

trans-unit.resname: BRC·23 | Sardian Avenger | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever an artifact an opponent controls is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, CARDNAME deals 1 damage to that player.

BRC·24 | Rootpath Purifier | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Lands you control and land cards in your library are basic.

trans-unit.resname: BRR·124 | Unwinding Clock | Card Name
BRR·124 | Unwinding Clock | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Untap all artifacts you control during each other player's untap step.
trans-unit.target: 于每位其他牌手的重置步骤中，重置所有由你操控的神器。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·125 | Well of Lost Dreams | Card Name
BRR·125 | Well of Lost Dreams | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you gain life, you may pay {X}, where X is less than or equal to the amount of life you gained. If you do, draw X cards.
trans-unit.target: 每当你获得生命时，你可以支付{X}，X须等于或小于你所获得的生命数量。若你如此作，则抓X张牌。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·126 | Wurmcoil Engine | Card Name
BRR·126 | Wurmcoil Engine | Card Text | Paragraph 1
BRR·126 | Wurmcoil Engine | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, create a 3/3 colorless Phyrexian Wurm artifact creature token with deathtouch and a 3/3 colorless Phyrexian Wurm artifact creature token with lifelink.
trans-unit.target: 当亚龙卷引擎死去时，派出一个3/3无色，具死触异能的非瑞人／亚龙衍生神器生物，和一个3/3无色，具系命异能的非瑞人／亚龙衍生神器生物。
